refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: Export a range of applied patches to a given directory (defaults to patches-<branch>) in a standard unified GNU diff format. A template file (defaulting to .git/patchexport.tmpl or ~/.stgit/templates/patchexport.tmpl or /usr/share/stgit/templates/patchexport.tmpl) can be used for the patch format. The following variables are supported in the template file:
refsect1.literallayout: %(description)s - patch description %(shortdescr)s - the first line of the patch description %(longdescr)s - the rest of the patch description, after the first line %(diffstat)s - the diff statistics %(authname)s - author's name %(authemail)s - author's e-mail %(authdate)s - patch creation date %(commname)s - committer's name %(commemail)s - committer's e-mail

listitem.simpara: Export patches to DIR instead of the default.
Prefix the patch names with order numbers.
Use BRANCH instead of the default branch.
Dump the patches to the standard output.
Extra options to pass to "git diff".
